trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This new instance is empty, that is, it does not yet contain any <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個新的執行個體是空的也就是說，它未包含任何<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Object> that is a table mapping to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Object>也就是資料表對應至集合。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""> </xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref> object added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The object passed in was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的物件不是<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to the collection when given a source table name and a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件至集合時指定來源資料表名稱和<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table to map from.
trans-unit.target: 要從對應的來源資料表名稱區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table to map to.
trans-unit.target: 名稱，不區分大小寫的<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>對應至資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref:System.Array> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目複製<xref:System.Array>至集合結尾。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of values to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>要加入至集合的值。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目複製<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>陣列至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>来加入至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>從集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the given <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否指定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>也就是<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個集合包含指定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref>，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件集合中存在具有指定的來源資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive source table name containing the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 區分大小寫的來源資料表名稱包含<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with this source table name; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合包含<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>物件與此來源資料表名稱，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> to the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 複製的項目<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref>到指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to the specified array.

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the array.

trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table to find.
trans-unit.target: 名稱，不區分大小寫的<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>若要尋找的資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref>物件具有指定<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得可逐一查看的列舉值的集合。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，可用來逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name, using the given <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>物件與指定的來源資料表名稱和<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>資料表名稱，並使用給定<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>存在於集合中傳回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> does not exist in the collection for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following happens: |MissingMappingAction|Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object with the given `sourceTable` as the source table name and `dataSetTable` as the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>給定<xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>集合中不存在，會發生下列狀況: |MissingMappingAction |採取動作 | |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|建立<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>物件指定`sourceTable`來源資料表的名稱和`dataSetTable`為<xref:System.Data.DataSet>資料表名稱。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 建立的<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>物件不會加入至集合。 | |`Error`|會產生例外狀況。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>

trans-unit.source: The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|Gets `null`.
trans-unit.target: `dataSetTable`參數已忽略。 | |`Ignore`|Gets `null`.

trans-unit.source: The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.|
trans-unit.target: `dataSetTable`參數已忽略。 |
